tournament.name: BCDL 21 - Ohio - Buffalo Chicken Dip Legacy

decks.notes: The primary focus of this BUG Control deck is to disrupt and control the opponent's game plan through a combination of hand disruption, removal spells, and counterspells. The deck aims to maintain control of the board while gradually building card advantage and out-valuing the opponent. It utilizes powerful threats like Murktide Regent and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student to apply pressure and close out the game. The mana base is designed to provide access to all necessary colors while also disrupting the opponent's mana base with cards like Wasteland.
